sentences: Tema on haiget, kuid ei taha näidata seda.
Lapsed said teada, et nad on haiget ja võivad jätta kodutööd tegemata.
Ta mängis nii hästi haiget, et keegki ei uskunud, et ta terve on.
context: The word 'haiget' is the partitive case of 'haalik' (sick person) or related forms. It refers to someone who is pretending to be ill or feigning sickness. This could involve faking symptoms, exaggerating minor ailments, or deliberately acting sick to avoid responsibilities like school work or chores.
